com.flyingspaniel.net.weather

Class NOAAWeather

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.flyingspaniel.xml.UsesXPath
      • com.flyingspaniel.net.weather.NOAAWeather
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Weather.Interface<Double[]>, Callable<Weather.Interface<Double[]>>

    public class NOAAWeather
extends UsesXPath
implements Weather.Interface<Double[]>
    Implementation of IWeather using the NOAA National Weather Service
    Since:
    Copyright(c) 2013 Morgan Conrad
    Author:
    Morgan Conrad
    See Also:
    This software is released under the LGPL

    , NOAA REST Web Service
